# 11 Docs

## Globalization

- [Japanese Calendar minimum supported date corrected](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/11/japanese-calendar-min-date.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 11 where the Japanese Calendar minimum supported date was corrected from 1868-09-08 to 1868-10-23.
